ingredients.ingredient: 1 large English cucumber, cut into 1/4 inch slices

cookingTips: Salt cucumbers and let sit for 15 minutes to draw out excess moisture before pickling
Mix vinegar and honey while warm, then cool before pouring over cucumbers for even seasoning
Refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving to allow flavors to meld
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you achieve crispy pickled cucumbers with balanced sweet and tangy notes while maintaining their texture?
